DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Immunotherapy House Dust Mite Allergoid
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Trial Immunotherapy With House Dust Mite Allergoid
DOC.detailed_description: A multicentre randomized placebo-controlled double-blind clinical trial evaluation safety efficacy specific immunotherapy aluminium hydroxide-adsorbed allergoid preparation house dust mite ( Dermatophagoides pteronyssinus ) patient rhinitis/rhinoconjunctivitis and/or allergic asthma bronchiale
DOC.criteria: Positive SPT Positive EAST Positive specific provocation test Serious chronic diseases perennial allergy
